calloutBox.title: Joyful Jaguars
calloutBox.subTitle: 43 months to 48 months
calloutBox.content: Our Joyful Jaguars program has 15 children ranging from approximately 43 months to approximately 48 months old. We have two consistent and nurturing staff caring for our preschool children daily.

mainContent.title: Program Details
mainContent.content: During their time in the Joyful Jaguars classroom, each child is given the opportunity to learn in a preschool rich environment. This experience consists of a morning circle time with calendar and our weekly theme, learning area activities centered around art, math, and science skills with a more pronounced focus on Zoophonics. Children will now be continuing to grow their handwriting skills through Handwriting Without Tears, supporting each child in aiming for Kindergarten Readiness. Our Joyful Jaguars classroom is taking one nap a day, playing outdoors twice a day, and enjoying our nutritional menu.
list: Personal cot and storage area provided
Parents provide an extra set of clothes and a cot sheet
Special art and various age development projects
Bi-Weekly Bible stories and prayers before each meal
Nutritious breakfast, lunch, and snack provided

boxes.title: Ms. Nicole - Lead Teacher
boxes.text: I attended GRCC and earned my Associates Degree in Early Childhood Development. I have one brother and two dogs named Champ and Casper. I enjoy sports, being outside, and my favorite time of year is Summer because I love spending time fishing on the lake.

boxes.title: Ms. Athena
boxes.text: I attend GRCC for Early Childhood Education but I also enjoy business classes. I grew up in Lowell and am the middle child of 3 with an older brother and a younger sister. I am huge on the importance of family. I enjoy cooking, water activities, and the occasional spa day. My favorite time of year is Fall.
